title: Give Me A Sight, O Savior
author: K. A. M. Kelly (1869-1942)
presentation: v1 c v2 c v3 c v4 c

v1: Give me a sight, O Savior,
Of Thy wondrous love to me,
Of the love that brought Thee down to earth,
v2: Was it the nails, O Savior,
That bound Thee to the tree?
Nay, it was Thine everlasting love,
Thy love for me, for me.
v3: That through Thy death for me,
My open sins, my secret sins,
v4: Then melt my heart, O Savior,
Bend me, yea, break me down,
c1: Help me to take it in,
What it meant to Thee, the Holy One,
